Circle system

Circle system May be semi-open or closed . It is closed when fresh gas flow rate (FGF) = uptake of gases by patient. In steady state, this means FGF = VO2 .

The standard arrangement of components is shown in the figure. Re-breathing will not occur as long as there are two unidirectional valves between the four components (A-B-C-F) and the patient.

Time constant for equilibration = Volume of circle/fresh gas flow.
